title: Life and Youth - relationship to the Millions

content.prompt: In the context of the poem as a whole, which choice best describes the speaker’s relationship to the “Millions” mentioned in line 5 ?

choices.label: Although their example might encourage others, the speaker is unmoved by it.
Although they are united in their courage, the speaker struggles to share their convictions.
Although their endurance inspires others, the speaker finds their actions objectionable.
Although their numbers seem overwhelming, the speaker dismisses them as being inconsequential.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
